meta.@content: Wolverine is an M1A1 tank chassis with a deployable Heavy Assualt Bridge(HAB). Original M1A1 model authored by Scott Tufts.
TODO list: - split out HAB as separate model; - build prototypes; . figure out how to add HABs to scene repeatedly; - check sound and image urls, permissions
M1A1 Main Battle Tank Abrams, MBT, Wolverine, HAB, Heavy Assault Bridge, AVLB
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding
